title: Loyalty Challenge Task
description: Details about a task within a loyalty challenge, including state, dates, variables, and completion tracking.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Task Start Date
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Date and time when the task started.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Task End Date
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Date and time when the task ended.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Is Single Transaction
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Indicates if the task must be completed in a single transaction.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Include
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Defines the item labels/categories that will satisfy this task.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Values Set
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: List of item labels or categories that qualify for task completion.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Exclude
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Defines the item labels/categories that should be excluded from satisfying this task.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Values Set
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: List of item labels or categories that should not count toward task completion.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Task Completions
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: List of task completions that counted toward satisfying this task.
